title: Day 121 (2 Samuel 5, 1 Chronicles 11-12) - Year 3

description:

FROM TODAY’S PODCAST: 

- Episode 111 - The Bible Recap

- Romans 11:36

- The Bible Recap Study Guide and Discussion Guide
